name: Abura Soba
description: Abura Soba, also known as 'oil noodles', is a soupless ramen dish featuring a flavorful sauce, chopped greens, boiled eggs and pork.

name: Miso Ramen
description: Miso Ramen is a popular variant that incorporates miso paste into the broth, offering a rich umami flavor complemented by corn, bean sprouts, and slices of chashu pork.

name: Shio Ramen
description: Shio Ramen, meaning 'salt' ramen, features a lighter, clear broth seasoned primarily with salt, and is topped with green onions, bamboo shoots, and delicious pork chop.

name: Tantan Ramen
description: Tantan Ramen characterized by its spicy sesame broth and served with deep-fried pork, soft boiled egg, bok choy, and a drizzle of chili oil.

name: Tonkotsu Gyokai Ramen
description: Tonkotsu Gyokai Ramen blends pork bone broth with fish-based stock, creating a rich and complex flavor profile, accompanied by green onions, bamboo shot and soft-boiled eggs.

name: Tori Paitan Ramen
description: Features a rich paitan broth mixed with cream, and with broccoli, fried onions and bacon in the broth.
